bibl.title: Two Fiscal Registers from Early Islamic Egypt (P. Vatic. Aphrod. 13, SB XX 14701).
bibl.note: 1. P. Vatic. Aphrod. 13: Requisitions from the Monastery of Abba Apollos. - 2. P. Lond. III, 1097b descr. (= S.B. XX, 14701). A Fiscal Register from Apollinopolis Minor.
GONIS Nikolaos, Two Fiscal Registers from Early Islamic Egypt (P. Vatic. Aphrod. 13, SB XX 14701).
145.4 P. Lond. III, 1097b descr. P. Vatic. Aphrod. 13
